scripts.clear_docker_volume: find ../infra/docker_volumes/mono_api/* ! -name . -prune ! -name node_modules -prune ! -name coverage -type d -or ! -name README.md ! -name wait-for-it.sh -type f | xargs rm -rf
scripts.refresh_docker_volume: npm run clear_docker_volume && npm run update_docker_volume
scripts.start_mono_api: npm run refresh_docker_volume && docker-compose up mono_api
scripts.start_mono_api_silent: npm run refresh_docker_volume && docker-compose up -d mono_api
scripts.static_test_with_docker: npm run refresh_docker_volume && docker exec -it project_mono_api_1 /bin/bash -c "cd app && npm run static_test"
scripts.clear_swagger: find ../infra/docker_volumes/swagger/* ! -name README.md -type f | tac | xargs rm -rf
scripts.swagger: npm run clear_swagger && node swagger/swagger.js && npm run update_swagger
